channel.title: Uncategorized – Inside Wants Out
channel.description: the burgeoning internet empire of joshua connolly

item.title: Brand New Working Directory and Work Directives
item.dc:creator: Joshua Connolly
item.description: Hello again, world. I’ve updated my employment status to “gainfully employed” and now I’m working with new software I couldn’t afford on my own as well as updating this WordPress working directory, which I obviously can afford. Things have been worse and I’m trying my hardest to improve every day. It’s the best plan I’ve seen […]
item.content:encoded:
Hello again, world. I’ve updated my employment status to “gainfully employed” and now I’m working with new software I couldn’t afford on my own as well as updating this WordPress working directory, which I obviously can afford. Things have been worse and I’m trying my hardest to improve every day. It’s the best plan I’ve seen out there so I’ll stick with it.

I’ve updated the [footer.php] template to reflect how I’m posting this site as cheaply as possible, basically only paying for a domain name. The rest is handled by the Static Site Plugin for WordPress, and GitHub pages. I hereby offer my humble appreciation for that internet toolkit that came to me assembled and ready to plug and play.

The new gig details will stay under wraps for now but in time, I hope to elaborate on that as well. Let’s say after I get past the one year mark.

item.title: The time has come…
item.dc:creator: Joshua Connolly
item.description: This is the very first thing I have to say on my outrageously-easy-to-deploy WordPress blog: the time has come for me to open up my insides to the world. I don’t want to say “Hello World!” because, as a marketing major turned wannabe-technologist, that has always struck me as evidence of nothing more important to say. But […]
item.content:encoded: This is the very first thing I have to say on my outrageously-easy-to-deploy WordPress blog: the time has come for me to open up my insides to the world. I don’t want to say “Hello World!” because, as a marketing major turned wannabe-technologist, that has always struck me as evidence of nothing more important to say. But then, the theme I’m using already did that once and then, apparently, I did it again while talking about how unimportant the act is. I leave you with this thought. Saying hello to the world is now much more important to me than I ever thought it could be.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Joshua Connolly
item.description: Welcome to WordPress. This was my first post. I Edited and decided not to delete it, then decided to start writing!
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This was my first post. I Edited and decided not to delete it, then decided to start writing!
